rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports export projections without vivid language.
The segment discusses financial/trade metrics ('exports', 'million tons', 'billion dollars'), which are neutral.
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports a projection, not a calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment provides a projection about future exports, not capabilities or preparedness related to disease control/safety.
Reports projected economic data (exports) using a standard verb: "exports will reach up to 5.3 million tons".
